name: Buncee
overview:
Buncee is a DIY digital content creation platform

With Buncee you can create high quality digital communication content to market your business or products, create interactive presentations, or simply make fun e-greetings or social media posts. The web platform gives you a blank scrolling, digital canvas where you can add and arrange personal text and photos, public Google, Flickr, or Instagram images, YouTube videos, SoundCloud music and any elements within their library of backgrounds, clip art and messages, to create what they call ‘buncee’s’ – digital multi-media creations that can be shared via email, social network posts or embedded into your website or blog. The “Cloud” basis of this platform provides flexibility for creating and editing content without the need for an expensive or complicated software program.

Buncee has a strong mobile presence with their apps: ‘buncee bits’ and ‘buncee pro’, which are constantly featured in iTunes “What’s Hot”.

Buncee also has an interesting link to a non-profit charity – buncee was inspired and created by the founder of Daniella Maria Arturi Foundation, which is working to find a cure for a rare blood disorder in children called Diamond Blackfan Anemia (DBA). The buncee team hopes that they can provide a fun and effective tool to make digital content creation easier for online communities and to make digital communication more fun, while in turn hoping buncee will become a fun way to raise funds and support the Daniella Foundation’s goals to help families with DBA.
